books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.summary: A powerful story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

books.author: George Orwell
books.summary: A chilling vision of a totalitarian future where Big Brother watches everything.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: The timeless story of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy's complex courtship.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.summary: A tragic tale of love, wealth, and the corruption of the American Dream.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.summary: A young wizard discovers his magical heritage and begins his journey at Hogwarts.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.summary: Epic tale of politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet Arrakis.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.summary: A hilarious journey through space with an unwitting human and his alien friend.

books.title: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.summary: The rise and fall of a galactic empire, guided by the science of psychohistory.

books.title: The Murder of Roger Ackroyd
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: Hercule Poirot investigates a shocking murder with an unexpected twist.

books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.summary: A journalist and a hacker uncover dark family secrets in Sweden.

books.title: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.summary: A marriage's dark secrets are revealed when a wife mysteriously disappears.

books.title: Sapiens
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.summary: A sweeping look at the history and impact of Homo sapiens on Earth.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.summary: A powerful memoir about education's transformative power and family loyalty.

books.title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
books.author: Rebecca Skloot
books.summary: The story of cells that revolutionized medical science and the woman behind them.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.summary: The epic quest to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.

books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.summary: Political intrigue and power struggles in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros.

books.title: The Name of the Wind
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.summary: The legendary tale of Kvothe, told by the man himself.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.summary: A proven system for building good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.title: The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People
books.author: Stephen Covey
books.summary: Timeless principles for personal and professional effectiveness.

books.title: The Guns of August
books.author: Barbara Tuchman
books.summary: A masterful account of the first month of World War I.

books.title: A People's History of the United States
books.author: Howard Zinn
books.summary: American history told from the perspective of ordinary people and marginalized groups.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.summary: A shepherd's journey to find treasure leads to self-discovery.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.summary: The former First Lady's powerful memoir of her journey from Chicago to the White House.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.summary: A psychotherapist becomes obsessed with treating a woman who refuses to speak.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.summary: A nature-loving girl grows up isolated in the marshes of North Carolina.
